name: Moga
description: Moga is the frontend Project Lead responsible for managing the team, setting project goals, and ensuring code quality and adherence to best practices.

name: Landon Martinez
description: Landon is responsible for designing the user interface and experience for the application, ensuring that it is intuitive and easy to use.

name: Isabella Lee
description: Isabella is responsible for writing the code that powers the frontend of the application, bringing the design to life.

name: Lucas Rodriguez
description: Lucas is responsible for testing the frontend of the application, ensuring that it is bug-free and functioning correctly.

name: Sophia Patel
description: Sophia is responsible for ensuring that the frontend of the application is accessible to users with disabilities, following best practices and guidelines.

name: Shan Mary
description: Shan is responsible for developing and maintaining the frontend codebase of the application, implementing new features and optimizing performance.

name: Olivia Evans
description: Olivia is responsible for developing and maintaining the backend codebase of the application, managing the database, and ensuring that data is properly handled and secured.

name: Gavin Lee
description: Gavin is responsible for ensuring that the deployment process runs smoothly, managing server infrastructure, and implementing automated testing and deployment processes to improve development efficiency and reliability.

name: Zoe Nguyen
description: Zoe is responsible for driving the product vision and roadmap, conducting user research and analysis, and ensuring that the product meets the needs of users

name: Sawn Suzie
description: Suzie is responsible for analyzing user data and feedback to make data-driven decisions for the application.

name: Martel Inglesie
description: Martel is responsible for developing and maintaining the backend codebase of the application, managing the database, and ensuring that data is properly handled and secured.

name: Moris Wonder world
